Its a really good movie. This movie stands strong and powerful in its content, straight and solid dialogues and classy and apt performances. The story, is very beautifuly woven with superbly scripted pages giving importance to each star in the cast, who with extraordinary ease have brought the characters to life. As the narrative moves, the movie takes the viewer through the perspectives of the characters, and naturaly convinces to the choices between power, money, rishtey, righteousness, and brings to the viewer a classy climax. The feel of the movie is a mashup of Zanjeer-Trishul-Don, era, but nowhere a copy of them, and a total modern and realistic space. This movie deserved very high appreciation both financially and critically but could find just  some average collection(as per Wikipedia data). Its actually a rightfully worthy multistarer with genuine performances.
One of the best movies of 2013. It was a movie which gave importance to every characters. Dont know why it didn't do well in box office. I would give a rate of 8 out of 10.
Good movie...Keeps you guessing what comes next until the very end..Ofcourse it has its plot holes but still a good watch..i don't understand why the hate for this nice movie though.
